document.stem: The Local Network card in the Advanced View displays:
document.li1: The status of the local DHCP server.

The IP address and netmask
The IP address must be not in the same range as other network interfaces, such as WAN WLAN.
document.p: To open the Local Network page, click the Local Network card in the Advanced View .
The Local Network settings are grouped into the following sections:

li1.link:
DHCP Settings
This section is not available when the device is switched to bridged mode.

Static leases
This section is not available when the device is switched to bridged mode.
